p: Chemicals including 1,1-Diphenyl-2-picryl-hydrazyl (DPPH), methanol, phosphate buffer, potassium ferricyanide (C 6N 6 FeK 3), Trichloroacetic acid (C 2HCl 3O 2), Iron (III) chloride (FeCl 3), hydrochloric acid (HCl), nitric acid (HNO 3), sodium phosphate, Ammonium molybdate ((NH 4) 2MoO 4), Di-methylsulfoxide (CH 3) 2SO, and gold (III) chloride trihydrate (HAuCl 4Â·3H 2O), silver nitrate (AgNO 3) were purchased from Sigma Aldrich, USA. All glassware was rinsed with aqua regia before used for the synthesis of AuNPs. All reagents used were of analytical grade.
